SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents a single playing card in the Crazy Eights game.
Client
The Client class handles the network connection from the player's side.
CustomDialog
CustomDialog handles the pre-game connection dialog.
Deck
Represents the deck of cards used in the Crazy Eights game.
Game
Represents the overall game state for Crazy Eights.
GameController
The GameController handles the interaction between the Game model, GameView UI, and Client networking logic.
GameView
GameView handles all UI rendering and interactions This class is the View in the MVC pattern.
MenuSystem
MenuSystem creates the application menu bar with game and language options.
NetworkHandler
NetworkHandler manages input/output for a single client connection.
NetworkHandler.MessageListener
Functional interface for receiving messages from the socket (client-side).
Player
Represents a player in the Crazy Eights game.
Protocol
Protocol defines the constants and helper methods for message formats exchanged between the client and server during gameplay.
Server
Server class for hosting a Crazy Eights multiplayer game.
StartPage
The StartPage class is the main entry point for the Crazy Eights game.
